pr_title: Fix Logging in ApplyMojo during OpenShift detection

timeline.message:
Fix Logging in ApplyMojo during OpenShift detection

Somehow Openshift detected statement was showing without
any color

timeline.body:
`getLog()` is retrieving the log defined in AbstractMojo which is **not** an instance of KitLogger.

This change is OK for now, but once we tackle #147 and #146 [these variables](https://github.com/eclipse/jkube/blob/edb82c8ef8dff52a48b4c4e5dac4b183d5fe61e1/kubernetes-maven-plugin/plugin/src/main/java/org/eclipse/jkube/maven/plugin/mojo/build/AbstractJKubeMojo.java#L70) should be private and getter methods (`getKitLogger()`, etc.) should be used instead
